channel.title: Funniest Video Game Lines
channel.description: Post 'em here. Mine is "I can see you're MIT education really pays for itself" from Half Life 2. I don't know why, but I just find that hilarious. Second funniest is anything Sheogorath says in Shivering Isles.

item.title: Funniest Video Game Lines
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
From Grand Theft Auto: Vice City. I lol’d for a solid 5 minutes:

Umberto: And I call him a little girl, Papi. Look at him, all dressed up like that. What is this, ladies night? You some kind of tough guy, you dress like a woman? You got on panties like a woman too, huh?
Tommy: What you got against women? You prefer men, big boy?

Read full topic

item.title: Funniest Video Game Lines
item.dc:creator: X-tra
item.description:
“Okay, so the evac’ station is abandoned and we’re at the center of a zombie filed building. On the bright side, we’re all probably gonna die”.

  • Nick, Left 4 Dead 2.

Or whatever is in this video. They’re all funny quotes.

Read full topic

item.title: Funniest Video Game Lines
item.dc:creator: Imonfire
item.description:
“The Catch-a-Ride up by Fyrestone is more busted than my momma’s girl parts. Why don’t you take a poke at it? The uh, system, not my mom. Hot dog down a Skag den, know what I’m sayin’?”

item.description:
When clicking on one of the cactus in the first Chapter of Escape from Monkey Island Guybrush Threepwood “As usefull as a two pronged cactus would be, I like to keep the number of sharp pointy objects in my pants to a minimum.”

item.dc:creator: Kent_Slak
item.description:
After seeing this topic i rembered a old game from Croteam called Serious Sam 2

After getting the second Uzi: Double the Gun, Double the Fun.
After Crossing the road stop and he has to pay 500000 €: Raise the ramp and handover the Cash BITCH!

item.title: Funniest Video Game Lines
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
Security guard: Sorry, this is going to sound weird, but the scanner says you’re… dead.
Shepard: I was only mostly dead. Try finding THAT option on government paperwork.

item.title: Funniest Video Game Lines
item.dc:creator: Nerdguy
item.description:
Katana:

Naw, you need to do the full thing.

Phoenix: The contradiction in Ema’s picture is…uh, this part here?
Judge: Hmm…I don’t see what’s so strange about that.
Phoenix: That’s because the drawing stinks!
Ema: !..Mr. Wright…How could you…sniff
Edgeworth: The act of making an innocent girl cry should warrant the death penalty. (you get penalized)

I got a full-on verbatim text file of these things. It takes up most of my hard drive.

More Awesome-ish version:

Read full topic

item.title: Funniest Video Game Lines
item.dc:creator: Apollomasque
item.description:
MY FISTS THEY ARE MADE OF STEEEEEEEL.

Also, this one’s a little complex. In Saint’s row 2, you can make your character look like anyone you want. But often when you meet friends from the first game, they ask you if you did something with your hair, and the PC always edgily explains that (s)he’s been getting that a lot . (The funny part is that you’ve had reconstructive surgery)
Anyway, near the very end of the game, you meet one of your old mentors and the exchange goes something like this.

Old Guy: Hello, old friend. You look…different
Player: (Immediately pulls a gun on him and advances) I didn’t do SHIT to my hair!

It’s a great brick joke, and like all good ones, not very funny when you sum it up.

Read full topic

“Hi! I like shorts! They’re comfy and easy to wear!”

Oh lol, I remember that one.

item.title: Funniest Video Game Lines
item.dc:creator: eateroftheflame
item.description:
“Oh no, the zombies killed God”
The response to the “God is dead” writing in Left 4 Dead.

“You have got to be kidding me, did you just throw that Aperture Science thing we don’t know what it does into an Aperture Science emegency intelligence incinerator?”
GLaDOS

Read full topic

item.title: Funniest Video Game Lines
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
The following is a conversation between a female medic and a male medic in HL2.

“When this is all over, I’m gonna… ah, who am I kidding?”
“What do you expect me to do about it?”
:jizz:
